issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Add support for views. Views existing within "windows". A window can have more than one view.

For iphone, a window includes the navbar and toolbar, and the view is the content area. You should be able to programatically change views. You should be able to optionally use an animation for view transitions (e.g., flop or curl).

Android will not initially support animation transitions.

{html}
